email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, 10,000MT of Ethanol - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope you're doing well. We have the MV OCEAN BREEZE (DWT: 45,000, LOA: 200m) available for your shipment of 10,000MT of ethanol from Houston to Rotterdam on FOB terms. The starting freight quote is USD 45.50 per metric tonne. Laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, 10,000MT of Ethanol - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the quote. USD 45.50 seems a bit high given the current market. Could you review this rate? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate and confirm the loading window in Houston?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, 10,000MT of Ethanol - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your response. I can offer a revised rate of USD 44.00 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, and the loading window in Houston is 48 hours. Please let me know if this revised offer works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, 10,000MT of Ethanol - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 44.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 43.50? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 16-21 October?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, 10,000MT of Ethanol - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 43.50 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 16-21 October. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, 10,000MT of Ethanol - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
- Cargo: 10,000MT Ethanol
- Load Port: Houston
- Discharge Port: Rotterdam
- Laycan: 16-21 October
- Freight: USD 43.50
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: FOB

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Maria Gonzalez
